START.error_critical:
âŒ Dambudziko guru rakaitika: {error}
Ndapota edza zvakare kana taura nevanobatsira.
START.error_send_welcome: âŒ Kukanganisa kutumira meseji yekugamuchira. Ndapota edza zvakare kana taura nevanobatsira.
START.getting_started_value:
â€¢ Shandisa `/daily` kutora mapoinzi ezuva
â€¢ Edza `/texttr` kune yako yekutanga shanduro
â€¢ Tarisa `/shop` kune zvekukwidziridzwa zvenguva pfupi
â€¢ Shandisa `/help` kune mirairo yakakwana
START.admin_tips_value:
â€¢ Shandisa `/setchannel` kudzora shanduro kune mamwe machannels/mitauro
â€¢ Shandisa `/invite` kuwedzera Muse kune mamwe servers
â€¢ Shandisa `/help` kune mirairo yose
START.voice_commands_value:
`/voicechat [source] [target]` - Shanduro yezwi yenguva chaiyo
`/voicechat2 [lang1] [lang2]` - Shanduro yakakwiridzwa yemativi maviri
`/voice [text] [source] [target]` - Zvinyorwa kuenda kuzwi shanduro
`/speak [text] [source] [target]` - Dudzira uye ridza muchannel yezwi
START.text_commands_value:
`/texttr [text] [source] [target]` - Dudzira zvinyorwa
`/autotranslate [source] [target]` - Dudzira-otomatiki meseji dzako dzose
`/read [message_id] [target]` - Dudzira chero meseji yakatumirwa neID
`/dmtr [user] [text] [source] [target]` - Tumira DM yakadudzirwa
START.achievements_value:
`/achievements` - Ona kufambira mberi kwako
`/rewards` - Tarisa mapoinzi ako nechikamu
`/cashout` - Shandura mapoinzi ezvakawirwa kuita mapoinzi ekuita
`/daily` - Tora mapoinzi ezuva
`/shop` - Tarisa chitoro chemapoinzi
`/buy [item]` - Tenga zvinhu kubva muchitoro
`/buypoints [amount]` - Tenga mapoinzi akawedzera
`/gift [amount]` - Ipa shamwari dzako mapoinzi
`/profile` - Ona profile yako
`/leaderboard` - Ona vashandisi vepamusoro
`/transactions` - Ona nhoroondo yekuchinjana mapoinzi
START.settings_value:
`/hide` kana `/show` - Shandura kuonekwa kwezvinyorwa zvepakutanga
`/preferences` - Gadzirisa sarudzo dzemitauro
`/history` - Ona nhoroondo yeshanduro
`/list` - Ona mitauro yose inotsigirwa
`/upgrade` - Vhura zvinhu zvepremium
`/help` - Rondedzero yakazara yemirairo
`/stop` - Pedzisa chikamu cheshanduro
START.community_value:
`/feedback` - Rondedzera uye ongorora Muse (wana mapoinzi!)
`/reviews` - Ona zvinotaura vamwe vashandisi
`/invite` - Govera Muse neshamwari (wana mapoinzi!)
`/vote` - Tsigira bot pamasaiti ekurondedzera bot (wana mapoinzi!)
START.upgrade_benefits_value:
ğŸ¥‰ **Basic ($1/mwedzi):** 500 mavara, 1h zwi, kuwana nhoroondo
ğŸ¥ˆ **Premium ($3/mwedzi):** 2000 mavara, 2h zwi, kugadzirisa kwekutanga
ğŸ¥‡ **Pro ($5/mwedzi):** Zvisingaperi zvose + zvinhu zvebeta
START.premium_active_value:
â€¢ Miganhu yakakwiridzwa: {text_limit} mavara
â€¢ Nguva yezwi: {voice_limit} maminetsi
â€¢ Mukwanisi wemapoinzi: {multiplier}
â€¢ Tinotenda nekutsigira Muse! ğŸ’–
START.language_format_value:
Unogona kushandisa mazita emitauro kana makodhi:
â€¢ Mazita: `English`, `Spanish`, `Japanese`
â€¢ Makodhi: `en`, `es`, `ja`
â€¢ Muenzaniso: `/texttr text:'Hello World' source_lang:English target_lang:Spanish`

LIST.title: Mitauro Inowanikwa yeShanduro
LIST.description: Heyi mitauro yose yaunogona kushandisa nemududziri:

HELP.title: ğŸ¤– Muse Shanduri - Rondedzero yeMirairo
HELP.reward_value:
`/daily` - Tora mubayiro wezuva
`/shop` - Tarisa chitoro chemibayiro
`/buy [mubayiro]` - Tenga mibayiro uchishandisa mapoinzi
`/profile [mushandisi]` - Tarisa chimiro chako nemanhamba
`/rewards` - Tarisa mibayiro yako inoshanda
`/gift [mushandisi] [uwandu]` - Ipa mapoinzi kune vamwe
HELP.social_value:
`/leaderboard` - Tarisa vanotungamira mapoinzi
`/achievements` - Tarisa zvawakawana nemabheji
`/cashout` - Tenga nemapoinzi awawana mu`/shop`
`/transactions` - Tarisa nhoroondo yemapoinzi ako
HELP.setup_value_admin:
`/setchannel [channel_id]` - Gadzirisa chiteshi chekududzira nemvumo dzemutauro
`/stop` - Mira hurukuro ipi neipi yekududzira
HELP.settings_value:
`/hide` - Viga meseji yepakutanga mukududzira
`/show` - Ratidza meseji yepakutanga mukududzira
`/preferences` - Gadzirisa mitauro yako yekusarudzika
`/history` - Tarisa nhoroondo yako yekududzira
HELP.info_value:
`/list` - Tarisa mitauro inotsigirwa
`/upgrade` - Tarisa sarudzo dzePremium
`/invite` - Tora link dzekukoka bot
`/vote` - Tora link dzekuvhotera bot
`/help` - Ratidza rondedzero iyi yemirairo
HELP.readimage_value: `/readimage [mutauro_wekuenda]` - Bvisa uye dudzira chinyorwa kubva pamufananidzo uchishandisa OCR
HELP.context_value: `Dzvanya Right-click pameseji â†’ Apps â†’ Verenga Meseji` - Dudzira meseji ipi neipi
HELP.tips_value:
â€¢ Shandisa `auto` kuona mutauro otomatiki
â€¢ Makodhi emutauro: `en`, `es`, `fr` kana mazita: English, Spanish, French
â€¢ Wana mapoinzi mazuva ese uye tenga perks yePremium!
â€¢ Muenzaniso: `/texttr text:'hola' source_lang:es target_lang:en`
HELP.footer_server: Server Mode: {server} | Zvese zvinoshanda | Shandisa `/daily` kuwana mapoinzi!
HELP.footer_dm: User Mode: Zvakanakisisa muDMs | Zvishoma zvishoma zvishandiso zvepa server | Shandisa `/daily` kuwana mapoinzi!

READ.error_invalid_id_desc: Ndapota ipa message ID yakatenderwa (nhamba chete).
READ.how_to_get_id_value:
1. **Gonesa Developer Mode** muDiscord Settings > Advanced
2. **Right-click** meseji yaunoda kushandura
3. **Dzvanya 'Copy Message ID'**
4. **Namatidza ID** mumurairo uyu
READ.error_message_not_found_desc: Haikwanise kuwana meseji neID iyo muchannel ino.
READ.troubleshooting_value:

â€¢ **Channel imwe chete** - Meseji inofanira kunge iri muchannel ino
â€¢ **Haina kudzimwa** - Meseji ingave yakadzimwa
â€¢ **Mvumo** - Unofanira kuona meseji kuti uishandure
